publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1596.1 Tricia Marwick: Outworking Bill - UK Legislationâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1596) in the name of Mr Alasdair Morrison, leave out from "as set out" to end and insert "and therefore calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward legislation in Scotland to achieve these aims of the UK Outworking Bill."
